snippet: Despite high interest, relatively few Bay Area expatriates are expected to turn out at the Russian consulate in San Francisco to help elect Russia’s next president.
lead_paragraph: Despite high interest, relatively few Bay Area expatriates are expected to turn out at the Russian consulate in San Francisco to help elect Russia’s next president.

headline.seo: Most Russians in Bay Area Prefer to Watch Putin Vote From Afar
headline.main: Preferring to Watch Putin Vote From Afar
headline.print_headline: Preferring To Watch Putin Vote From Afar
